meanings.definition: A colorless, nonflammable liquid used in dry cleaning and degreasing.
meanings.sent1: The perchloroethylenes in the dry cleaning machine help remove stains from clothes.
meanings.sent2: I took my coat to the dry cleaner, and they used perchloroethylenes to clean it.
meanings.sent3: Why did the stain go to the dry cleaner? Because it heard perchloroethylenes were the best cleaners in town!
meanings.sent4: The perchloroethylenes worked like magic, making the old coat look brand new.
meanings.sent5: The strong smell of perchloroethylenes lingered on the freshly cleaned clothes.

meanings.sent2: The scientists studied the properties of perchloroethylenes for their research.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chemist break up with the other chemicals? Because perchloroethylenes stole their attention!
meanings.sent4: The perchloroethylenes mixed with the other compounds, creating a unique reaction.
